faqs.answer: The pricing structure for houses in Babyal is dynamic and depends heavily on factors like plot size construction age specific locality and amenities offered. Generally a compact 2 BHK builder floor might start from INR 35 Lakhs while a standard 3 BHK independent house typically falls within the INR 60 Lakhs to INR 90 Lakhs range. Luxury villas and larger 4 BHK properties on bigger plots can exceed INR 150 Lakhs.
